mods.abstract: Tape 3 of 3. Recording of the 1980 Fan Fair Reunion Show. Featuring Hugh Cherry (host), Clyde Foley Cummins (performer), Betty Foley Cummins (performer), and Stoneman Family (performers).

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
